summary: "Jack and the Beanstalk" is an English fairy tale about a boy named Jack who gets magical beans. The story has been around for over 200 years and has many versions. It's one of the most popular "Jack tales," where Jack is a brave hero. Researchers say the story is very old, maybe even 5,000 years, and comes from an ancient tale about a boy and an ogre's treasure. Today, we know it best from Joseph Jacobs' version from 1890.
title: Jack and the Beanstalk
